name: infra-nodejs
description: librarie de communication avec la base infra for nodeJS

scripts.pub: git checkout master  && git pull && npm version $npm_package_version && git checkout dev
scripts.vMajor: npm run initNewVBrach && npm --no-git-tag-version version major  && npm run pub
scripts.vMinor: npm run initNewVBrach && npm --no-git-tag-version version minor && npm run pub
scripts.initNewVBrach: git checkout -b V$npm_package_version && git push --set-upstream origin V$npm_package_version && git add -A && git push && git checkout dev
scripts.vPatch: npm --no-git-tag-version version patch && npm run pub
scripts.postversion: export minorTag=$(node -e "console.log(process.env.npm_package_version.split('.')[1]);") && export majorTag=$(node -e "console.log(process.env.npm_package_version.split('.')[0]);") && git tag -f dev_$majorTag &&  git tag -f dev_$majorTag.$minorTag && git tag dev_$npm_package_version && git add -A && git commit -m 'dev_$npm_package_version' && git push && git push -f --tags
scripts.publi: npm run build && npm run vPatch

scriptsDev.pub: git checkout master  && git pull && npm version $npm_package_version && git checkout dev
scriptsDev.vMajor: npm run initNewVBrach && npm --no-git-tag-version version major  && npm run pub
scriptsDev.vMinor: npm run initNewVBrach && npm --no-git-tag-version version minor && npm run pub
scriptsDev.initNewVBrach: git checkout -b V$npm_package_version && git push --set-upstream origin V$npm_package_version && git add -A && git push && git checkout dev
scriptsDev.vPatch: npm --no-git-tag-version version patch && npm run pub
scriptsDev.postversion: export minorTag=$(node -e "console.log(process.env.npm_package_version.split('.')[1]);") && export majorTag=$(node -e "console.log(process.env.npm_package_version.split('.')[0]);") && git tag -f dev_$majorTag &&  git tag -f dev_$majorTag.$minorTag && git tag dev_$npm_package_version && git add -A && git commit -m 'dev_$npm_package_version' && git push && git push -f --tags
scriptsDev.publi: npm run build && npm run vPatch

scriptsMaster.updateMaster: npm run rmDist && npm run devDistToMaster
scriptsMaster.postversion: export minorTag=$(node -e "console.log(process.env.npm_package_version.split('.')[1]);") && export majorTag=$(node -e "console.log(process.env.npm_package_version.split('.')[0]);") && git tag -f $majorTag &&  git tag -f $majorTag.$minorTag && git push && git push -f --tags

author: hf-dev
